#summary Extensions to Hapax2 Language
#labels Documentation

 Hapax2 is very liberal in what it accepts for name strings within its `{{ ... }}` blocks.

 Hapax3 variants found in [http://gap-data.googlecode.com/ gap-data] and more recently in [http://lxl.googlecode.com/ lxl] are developing a hierarchical naming scheme via simplified X-Path expressions.
